details.description: This script submits a Snakemake pipeline to a job scheduler, primarily SLURM.
details.scheduler: SLURM (with support for other schedulers like PBS, SGE, LSF, and Tibanna in the future)
details.usage: run.sh <MODE> [-h] [-c CACHE] -o OUTDIR -j MASTER_JOB_NAME -b SINGULARITY_BIND_PATHS -t TMP_DIR
